ModBotRelease.Changelog:
- Added "Import .cvm" button to customization editor's import panel. You can now import weapon models made with Custom robot model editor mod
- Added item exclusivity settings to customization editor
- Added playtest mode to customization editor
- Added ability to re-send the item to verification
- Added color preview dropdown to customization editor
- Added fire particles settings to customization editor
- Added Garbage bot skins mod support. Added the dropdown with skins to redesigned "Last Bot Standing" menu
- Added PlayerUseKeyTrigger improved description display
- Added improved subtitles
- Added suboptions to ambient occlusion option
- Added tooltips to every tab in settings menu. They display all sections of the highlighted tab
- Added save slots to auto-build. You can make up to 10 builds
- Added "Search levels" button to workshop browser when browsing subscriptions or user's levels
- Added "Reconnect" button to pause menu when playing Last bot standing
- Added "Updated" label to recently updated customization item button in the player customization menu
- Added "Verified" label to recently verified customization item button in the player customization menu. Only the author of the item can see this label
- Added "Reset Overhaul settings" button to "Advanced" tab in settings menu
- Moved user interface options to the new "Interface" tab in settings menu
- Made changes to player customization menu & editor UI
- Made the player customization menu select the subcategory of equipped weapon
- Transitions now disappear if the game crashes
- The text typed in the feedback menu is now saved
- Reworked the system responsible for scheduled tasks in the mod
- Reimplemented vignette and dithering effects in a better way to fix memory leaks and performance issues
- Removed update 5 content
